message:
Hi,
   I have successfully used the module in my site to login users using Twitter, facebook linkedIn and Google. but in these account user image is not pulled in into my site. Can you please tell me if it is being done by the module or I have to modify the module to do this.

This is not done by the application because implies extra data retrieval which is different on each provider, you must do it by yourself on a signal handler or similar. Take into account that some sites force you to use extra permissions to retrieve some information. You can use an SDK too to make your work easier (sometimes).

Omab, 
   Do you know if anybody has done anything similar with your app so that I have some codebase to start with.

Thanks,

@saqibku no that I'm aware of, I got a few questions about it, check the other topics, but nothing particular or released so far. I got the idea of making a second library that would make all that magic and play nice with django-social-auth, but I lack the time to focus on it at this moment.
